comment.author: Creede
comment.text: Trump can't make his businesses great how could he make America great? How many bankruptcys has he had. He has his clothing line made in China but preaches about keep businesses in america. One word for him "hypocrite"

replies.author: Loren
replies.text: Really didn't know he had a clothes line and wow made in China dang that's messed up that's just like all are sport teams and Nascar memorabilia made in China two ill cheer n love my teams but won't buy nothing unless its made in USA

replies.author: Creede
replies.text: America won't be great until there is peace and no hatred. Trump is prompting hatred. America won't be great until we get rid of the drug epidemic. He doesn't talk about drugs that are killing way too many ppl . A wall is not going to stop that. Bully's kill ppl and he is a bully. His ignorant way he talks to and about ppl will start ww3

replies.author: Tyler
replies.text: Loren so you're telling me you DO NOT OWN OR HAVE PAID FOR 1 item that was made in China?! You only buy things that were made in the USA?! If not THAN WHO CARES where his suits/clothing line is produced!!!! Quit sucking on the GOVT Tits and Wake up!
